note:
Delivery driver by vocation, Philosopher by avocation. He/him.

I'm here for the sense of wonder. That said:

I am a liberal, not an anarchist.
I am loyal to the US Constitution, though it has its flaws.
I am not a pacifist, but I am opposed to terrorism.
I am willing to discuss these points, but if they are deal breakers for you, block or mute me and save us both a lot of aggravation.

Standing up for truth, justice, and, sigh, even the American way. I guess.
